This wasn't nearly as bad as I thought I'd be based on the comments, but I used to actually watch MacGyver when I was a kid.

In fact, just a few months back I was on a Mythbuster marathon and after the "macgyver special" eppisode I'd decided to watch some of the show again, and it was hallarious how absolutlely stupid the show I loved as a kid as an adult..

I wonder how many people badmouthing this movie are off the generation mark enough to not even get the joke of what they're making fun of..
